cdap_env.hadoop_home_warn_suppress: $(hadoop dfsadmin -safemode wait >/dev/null 2>&1; sleep 1; [[ ${UID} -eq 0 ]] && su - hdfs -c 'for d in /cdap /user/cdap; do hdfs dfs -mkdir -p ${d} ; hdfs dfs -chown cdap ${d}; done' >/dev/null 2>&1; echo true)
cdap_env.hive_classpath:
$(until $(which hive &>/dev/null); do sleep 5; done)${HIVE_CLASSPATH:-/etc/hive/conf:$(ls -1 /usr/lib/hive/lib/*.jar | tr '
' ':')$(if [[ -r /etc/hive/conf/hive-env.sh ]]; then source /etc/hive/conf/hive-env.sh ; fi ; if [[ -d ${HIVE_AUX_JARS_PATH} ]]; then ls -1 ${HIVE_AUX_JARS_PATH}/*.jar | tr '
' ':'; else echo ${HIVE_AUX_JARS_PATH} | tr ',' ':'; fi)$(ls -1 /usr/lib/hive/auxlib/*.jar 2>/dev/null | tr '
' ':')}
